title: Lynda - WordPress 2015 Essential Training [Update Sep 25, 2015]

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

5h 14m Beginner Aug 17, 2015 Updated Sep 25, 2015  | Uploaded in Oct 20, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Web 
Software: WordPress 
Author: Morten Rand-Hendriksen 

WordPress powers millions of blogs and websites. Learn how to create your own with this powerful publishing platform. Staff author Morten Rand-Hendriksen will help you get the most out of the self-hosted version of WordPress and create feature-rich blogs and websites. Morten explains how to create and publish posts and pages; customize your site with themes, widgets, and custom menus; and extend WordPress even further with plugins. Plus, learn how to get more readers with social media sharing and comments, and how to adjust the settings that keep your site safe and secure.â€¨â€¨Note: This course covers WordPress 4.3. We will update the training as WordPress evolves. 
Topics include:

	â€¢	Formatting text
	â€¢	Publishing and scheduling posts
	â€¢	Adding images, audio, and video
	â€¢	Bulk editing posts and pages
	â€¢	Customizing themes and menus
	â€¢	Using widgets
	â€¢	Extending WordPress with plugins
	â€¢	Editing users profiles
	â€¢	Configuring settings
	â€¢	Getting new readers
	â€¢	Keeping WordPress up to date and secure
